content.name: LookupSong
content.description: Search for a song. The format for values of parameters related to date is "^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$", and for parameters related to time, it is "HH:MM". Values for parameters indicating yes or no should use the boolean type.

content.name: PlaySong
content.description: Play the selected song on the device. The format for values of parameters related to date is "^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$", and for parameters related to time, it is "HH:MM". Values for parameters indicating yes or no should use the boolean type.

content.name: cancel_alarm
content.description: This tool is used to cancel one or more alarms based on the specified time and recurrence pattern.

recurrence.description: Specifies on which days the alarm should be canceled. Each element in the list can be a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. If not provided, all alarms at the specified time will be canceled.

time.description: The specified time of the alarms to be canceled, in 24-hour format (HH:MM).

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

content.name: cancel_all_alarms
content.description: This tool is used to cancel all of the user's set alarms without requiring specific details for each individual alarm.

content.name: change_alarm_name
content.description: This tool is used to change the name of an existing alarm to a new specified name.

time.description: The specific time of the alarm to retrieve information about.

current_name.description: The current name or label of the alarm that the user wants to change.

new_name.description: The new name or label that the user wants to assign to the alarm.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: change_alarm_sound
content.description: This tool is used to change the sound of an existing alarm to a new specified sound.

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

time.description: The specified time for the alarm to go off.

sound.description: The new sound the user wants to use.

vibrate.description: Specifies the intensity of the vibration for the alarm. A value of 0 means no vibration. If the intensity of the vibration is not specified, the default intensity is 5.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: change_alarm_time
content.description: This tool is used to change the time of an existing alarm to a new specified time.

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

current_time.description: The current time to which the user wants to change.

new_time.description: The new time to which the user wants to set the alarm.

current_recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

new_recurrence.description: Specifies how often the copied alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: copy_alarm
content.description: This tool is used to create a copy of an existing alarm with a new specified recurrence pattern and label, while preserving the original source time and recurrence.

label.description: A label for the copied alarm.

target_time.description: The time of the copied alarm, in the 24-hour format (HH:MM).

source_time.description: The time of the existing alarm to copy, in the 24-hour format (HH:MM).

source_recurrence.description: The recurrence pattern of the existing alarm to copy. Each element can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

target_recurrence.description: The new recurrence pattern assigned to the copied alarm. Each element can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: get_alarm
content.description: This tool is used to retrieve details about the user's existing alarms, including time, label, recurrence, and other settings.

time.description: The specific time of the alarm to retrieve information about.

label.description: The custom label or description associated with the alarm to identify it.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

alarm_details.description: The details of the retrieved alarms, which could include time, label, recurrence, sound, vibration settings, etc.

time.description: The specific time of the alarm to retrieve information about.

label.description: The custom label or description associated with the alarm to identify it.

sound.description: The chosen sound for the alarm when it goes off.

vibrate.description: Specifies the intensity of the vibration for the alarm. A value of 0 means no vibration. If the intensity of the vibration is not specified, the default intensity is 5.

content.name: set_alarm
content.description: This tool is used for setting a new alarm based on the user's specified time, label, recurrence pattern, sound preference, and specific day(s) for the alarm to activate.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

sound.description: The chosen sound for the alarm when it goes off.

vibrate.description: Specifies the intensity of the vibration for the alarm. A value of 0 means no vibration. If the intensity of the vibration is not specified, the default intensity is 5.

time.description: The specified time for the alarm to go off.

content.name: AddToPlaylist

entity_name.description: The name of the song that the user wants to add to the playlist.

artist.description: The name of the artist of the song that the user wants to add to the playlist.

music_item.description: The specific music item that the user wants to add to the playlist.

playlist_owner.description: The owner of the playlist to which the user wants to add the song.

playlist.description: The name of the playlist to which the user wants to add the song.

confirmation_message.description: A message confirming that the song has been added to the playlist.

playlist_content.description: The current list of songs in the playlist after the addition.

items.description: The title and artist of each song in the playlist.

content.name: BookRestaurant
content.description: This tool allows the user to make a reservation at a specified restaurant.

poi.description: The point of interest related to where the restaurant is located.

party_size_description.description: Description of the party size for the reservation.

served_dish.description: Specific dish the restaurant serves that the user is interested in.

restaurant_name.description: Name of the restaurant to make a reservation at.

restaurant_type.description: Type or style of the restaurant like Japanese, Italian, etc.

facility.description: Facilities provided by the restaurant like WiFi, parking, etc.

spatial_relation.description: The spatial or geographic relation of the restaurant in reference to another location.

party_size_number.description: Number of people included in the reservation.

cuisine.description: Type of cuisine the restaurant offers.

country.description: Country where the restaurant is located.

sort.description: Sorting order for restaurant search results.

state.description: State where the restaurant is located.

city.description: City where the restaurant is located.

timeRange.description: Desired time range for the reservation.

reservation_confirmation.description: A confirmation message including the reservation details.

restaurant_details.description: Details about the restaurant including address, contact information, and any special notes.

contact.description: The contact information for the restaurant.

special_notes.description: Any special notes or additional information about the restaurant.

sound.description: The chosen sound for the alarm when it goes off.

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

properties.name: name_customer
properties.description: The name of the customer requesting the auto repair service.

properties.name: date_appt
properties.description: The specific date the customer wishes to book for the auto repair appointment.

properties.name: time_appt
properties.description: The specific time of day for the scheduled auto repair appointment.

properties.name: reason_appt
properties.description: The reason for the auto repair appointment, which may include details about the type of service or repair needed.

properties.name: name_vehicle
properties.description: The make or model name of the vehicle that requires repair.

properties.name: year_vehicle
properties.description: The manufacturing year of the vehicle to provide context about its potential needs for the repair.

properties.name: location_store
properties.description: The geographical location or address of the auto repair store.

properties.description: The manufacturing year of the vehicle to provide context about its potential needs for the repair.

content.name: RateBook
content.description: This tool allows users to rate books or other literary works.

object_select.description: The specific object in the literary work that the rating is associated with.

object_type.description: The type or the category of the book or the literary work.

rating_unit.description: The unit or scale in which the rating is given.

best_rating.description: The best or maximum rating that can be given to a book or a work of literature.

object_part_of_series_type.description: Indicating whether the literary work is part of a series and, if so, the type of that series.

rating_value.description: The rating value provided by a user for a particular book or literary work.

user_review.description: The user's review of the book or literary work, including the rating, review text, reviewer name, and review date.

content.name: SearchCreativeWork

It takes the name of the creative work as a required parameter and optionally, the type of the creative work. It returns information about the searched creative work, including details such as availability, platforms, genre, and purchase options.

object_type.description: The type of the creative work to be searched. It could be a movie, TV show, music album, book, or video game.

object_name.description: The name of the creative work to be searched.

creative_work_info.description: Information about the searched creative work, including details such as availability, platforms, genre, and purchase options.

content.name: SearchFlights
content.description: API for searching flight information.

flight_details.description: Flight details including flight number, departure, destination, date, departure time, arrival time, cabin class, and price.

object_location_type.description: Defines the type of the location where the screening event is held.

movie_name.description: The name of the movie or performance.

location_name.description: The name of the place where the event is screened.

object_type.description: Specifies the category of the screening event (movie, play, performance).

timeRange.description: The range of time during which the event is screened.

spatial_relation.description: The relational context of the location where the event is screened.

movie_type.description: The type/genre of the movie or performance.

screening_events.description: A list of screening events available based on the user's search criteria.

items.description: The title and screening times of each event.

content.name: add_new_contact
content.description: This tool allows for the creation of a brand-new contact entry in the user's contact list, using the provided personal information such as name, phone number, email address, and potentially a physical address.

email.description: The email address of the new contact, if available.

address.description: The physical address of the new contact.

contact_name.description: The full name of the new contact to be added to the contact list.

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the new contact.

creation_status.description: Confirms the successful creation of the new contact or provides details if there were any issues during the process.

content.name: adjust_lighting
content.description: Modifies the lighting conditions in a specified area, which can include dimming, color changes, or turning lights on or off.

intensity.description: Represents the level of brightness to be set if the lights are to be dimmed or brightened

location.description: Specifies the area where the lighting conditions are to be modified

action.description: Determines the action to be executed on the specified lighting conditions such as turning on or off lights or dimming

status.description: Returns the status of the action performed on the specified lighting conditions

content.name: adjust_music_volume
content.description: Changes the volume of the music currently being played on a connected audio system.

volume.description: A numerical representation of the desired music volume

confirmation.description: Confirmation message that the volume adjustment has been made accordingly

content.name: adjust_room_temperature
content.description: Controls the thermostat or heating/cooling system to set a specific temperature for a room or area.

temperature.description: The desired temperature to set the thermostat or heating/cooling system to.

location.description: The specific room or area where the temperature should be adjusted.

confirmation.description: A confirmation message that the temperature has been set as per user's instruction.

content.name: change_appointment
content.description: This tool is used to modify the details of an existing appointment. It requires the appointment ID along with the new information to be updated.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

new_appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

new_appointment_date.description: The new date for the appointment, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

new_appointment_time.description: The new time for the appointment, provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

new_appointment_location.description: Optional. The new location or address for the appointment if it has changed.

new_appointment_information.description: Optional. A new description for the appointment if additional details need to be specified.

update_status.description: Indicates whether the appointment was successfully updated or not.

content.name: check_door_status
content.description: Queries the status of a door to determine if it is currently open or closed, and may provide additional security information.

door_location.description: The location of the door that the user wants to check the status of

door_status.description: The current status of the door: locked or unlocked

content.name: delete_appointment
content.description: This tool is used to delete a specific appointment from a user's schedule based on provided identifiers such as appointment ID or date and time.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

deletion_status.description: Status of the deletion operation, indicating success or failure.

content.name: delete_contact
content.description: This tool permanently removes a contact from the user's contact list by name. It is important to note that once a contact is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact to be deleted from the user's contact list.

deletion_status.description: A message confirming whether the contact has been successfully deleted or an error message if the deletion could not be processed.

content.name: delete_contact_email
content.description: This tool deletes an email address associated with a specified contact in the user's contact list. This action is irreversible, and the email address cannot be retrieved once deleted.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact whose email address is to be deleted.

contact_email.description: The specific email address to be deleted, if known. If not provided, the default operation will assume the only or primary email is to be deleted.

email_order.description: Specifies the order of the email address to be deleted if the contact has multiple email addresses. For example, '1' for the primary email, '2' for the secondary, and so on.

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the email address or informs about any issues that prevented the deletion.

content.name: delete_contact_number
content.description: This tool is designed to remove a phone number from a specified contact's detail within the user's contact list. It allows for precise deletion based on the phone number itself or its order among multiple numbers.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact from whom the phone number is to be deleted. The full name is required.

contact_number.description: The specific phone number to be deleted. If provided, this number is directly targeted for deletion.

number_order.description: If the contact has multiple numbers and no specific number is provided, this parameter specifies the order of the number to delete (e.g., the first number, second number, etc.).

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the phone number or provides details if the operation couldn't be completed.

content.name: get_current_temperature

temperature.description: The current ambient temperature at the specified location.

name.description: The name or description of the appointment to help narrow down the search.

type.description: The type of appointment, such as 'dentist', 'doctor', 'work meeting', etc., to filter the appointments list.

time_range.description: A time range within the specified date to retrieve appointments for, such as 'morning' or 'afternoon'.

appointment_name.description: The name of the appointment.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment.

appointment_address.description: The location or address of the appointment.

lock_status.description: The status of the door lock after the 'lock_door' action

content.name: search_contact

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

content.name: set_appointment_reminder
content.description: This tool is used to create a reminder for a user-specified appointment. It requires details such as the appointment name, date, time, and optionally, the address and reminder time.

appointment_information.description: Provides detailed summary or specific information about the appointment. This could include purpose, participants, location, or any other important details relevant to the appointment.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

reminder_time.description: The time at which the reminder should trigger. Should be provided in a relative format such as '2 hours before' or an exact time format such as HH:MM.

content.name: update_contact_information
content.description: This tool allows for the modification of existing contact information or add more contact details within a user's contact list, such as updating a contact name, phone number, or email address.

phone_number.description: The original phone number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

email.description: The original email number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

name.description: The original name of the contact as currently stored in the contact list.

new_information.description: An object containing the new contact details that need to be updated.

new_name.description: The new name to assign to the contact, if changing the contact's name.

new_phone_number.description: The new phone number to be added to the contact list.

new_email.description: The new email to be added to the contact list.

update_status.description: Confirms the successful update of the contact's information or informs about any issues that prevented the update.

content.name: searchTaxi
content.description: Provides a taxi search service, allowing users to find available taxis and get pricing based on specific criteria.

day.description: The date for which the taxi service is required.

leaveAt.description: The desired departure time (requires either leaveAt or arriveBy)

arriveBy.description: The time by which the user wants to arrive at the destination (requires either leaveAt or arriveBy)

departure.description: The starting point of the journey

destination.description: The end point of the journey

return_info.description: A list of additional details the user wants to get back, with options including 'all', 'phone', 'license_plate', 'type'. If the user does not specify what information is needed, select 'all'; otherwise, fill in the corresponding name.

content.name: get_pizza_menu
content.description: This API should be called when users want to see the complete menu offerings of a specific pizza store. It provides details about all available pizza options, including descriptions, sizes, and pricing, helping users decide what to order.

properties.name: name_store
properties.description: The name of the pizza store where the order is being placed.

properties.name: name_pizza
properties.description: The specific name or title of the pizza chosen by the user.

properties.name: size_pizza
properties.description: The size of the pizza being ordered. Sizes typically range from small to large.

properties.name: type_topping
properties.description: The type of toppings requested on the pizza. Users can choose from a variety of toppings to customize their pizza according to their liking.

properties.name: type_crust
properties.description: The crust type desired for the pizza. Different options such as thin crust, thick crust, stuffed crust, or gluten-free crust may be available, depending on the pizza store.

properties.name: preference
properties.description: Any specific preferences or requests regarding the pizza order. This could include special instructions for preparation, such as 'extra cheese' or 'no onions'.

properties.name: location_store
properties.description: The geographical location of the pizza store.

content.name: add_new_contact
content.description: This tool allows for the creation of a brand-new contact entry in the user's contact list, using the provided personal information such as name, phone number, email address, and potentially a physical address.

email.description: The email address of the new contact, if available.

address.description: The physical address of the new contact.

contact_name.description: The full name of the new contact to be added to the contact list.

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the new contact.

creation_status.description: Confirms the successful creation of the new contact or provides details if there were any issues during the process.

content.name: delete_contact
content.description: This tool permanently removes a contact from the user's contact list by name. It is important to note that once a contact is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact to be deleted from the user's contact list.

deletion_status.description: A message confirming whether the contact has been successfully deleted or an error message if the deletion could not be processed.

content.name: delete_contact_email
content.description: This tool deletes an email address associated with a specified contact in the user's contact list. This action is irreversible, and the email address cannot be retrieved once deleted.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact whose email address is to be deleted.

contact_email.description: The specific email address to be deleted, if known. If not provided, the default operation will assume the only or primary email is to be deleted.

email_order.description: Specifies the order of the email address to be deleted if the contact has multiple email addresses. For example, '1' for the primary email, '2' for the secondary, and so on.

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the email address or informs about any issues that prevented the deletion.

content.name: delete_contact_number
content.description: This tool is designed to remove a phone number from a specified contact's detail within the user's contact list. It allows for precise deletion based on the phone number itself or its order among multiple numbers.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact from whom the phone number is to be deleted. The full name is required.

contact_number.description: The specific phone number to be deleted. If provided, this number is directly targeted for deletion.

number_order.description: If the contact has multiple numbers and no specific number is provided, this parameter specifies the order of the number to delete (e.g., the first number, second number, etc.).

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the phone number or provides details if the operation couldn't be completed.

content.name: freeze_bank_account
content.description: This tool places a hold on the specified bank account to prevent new transactions, in response to suspected unauthorized access or fraudulent activity.

freeze_reason.description: The reason for freezing the account, which helps the bank in further fraud assessment and investigation.

account_number.description: The unique identifier of the user's bank account that needs to be frozen to mitigate potential fraud.

freeze_status.description: Confirmation of the account being frozen and the subsequent status message indicating that the account is secured.

content.name: get_account_balance
content.description: This tool retrieves the current balance for a specified bank account.

account_number.description: The unique identifier for the user's bank account for which the balance is to be retrieved.

balance.description: The current balance of the specified account presented in a string format, ideally including the currency symbol.

content.name: get_recent_transactions
content.description: This tool retrieves the most recent transactions for a specified bank account to identify regular activity and potential unauthorized transactions.

transaction_type.description: Optional filter to return transactions of a specific type. The default value is 'all', which includes every type of transaction.

account_number.description: The unique identifier of the user's bank account from which recent transactions are to be fetched.

transactions.description: A list of transactions made within the specified time period, sorted by the most recent. Each transaction includes details such as date, type, amount, and description.

transaction_date.description: The date and time when the transaction occurred.

transaction_type.description: The type of the transaction (e.g., deposit, withdrawal, transfer, payment).

amount.description: The monetary amount involved in the transaction.

description.description: A brief description or memo provided for the transaction.

content.name: search_contact
content.description: This tool searches the user's contact list for a specific contact based on provided search criteria such as the contact's name, phone number, or email address.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

content.name: transfer_funds
content.description: This tool is used to perform a monetary transfer between a user's bank accounts, such as from a checking account to a savings account.

schedule_time.description: If the transfer is scheduled, this parameter specifies the date and time for the transfer to happen. Should follow the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format.

account_number.description: The unique identifier for the user's bank account from which funds will be transferred.

source_account.description: Indicates the account type or identifier from which the money will be debited (e.g., 'checking').

destination_account.description: Indicates the account type or identifier to which the money will be credited (e.g., 'savings').

amount.description: The amount of money to be transferred between accounts.

transfer_speed.description: Specifies the speed at which the transfer is to be made. The transfer can be 'now' for immediate processing, or 'scheduled' for a deferred transfer.

transfer_status.description: Provides information on the status of the fund transfer, indicating success, in-progress, or failure.

content.name: update_contact_information
content.description: This tool allows for the modification of existing contact information or add more contact details within a user's contact list, such as updating a contact name, phone number, or email address.

phone_number.description: The original phone number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

email.description: The original email number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

name.description: The original name of the contact as currently stored in the contact list.

new_information.description: An object containing the new contact details that need to be updated.

new_name.description: The new name to assign to the contact, if changing the contact's name.

new_phone_number.description: The new phone number to be added to the contact list.

new_email.description: The new email to be added to the contact list.

update_status.description: Confirms the successful update of the contact's information or informs about any issues that prevented the update.

content.name: add_new_contact
content.description: This tool allows for the creation of a brand-new contact entry in the user's contact list, using the provided personal information such as name, phone number, email address, and potentially a physical address.

email.description: The email address of the new contact, if available.

address.description: The physical address of the new contact.

contact_name.description: The full name of the new contact to be added to the contact list.

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the new contact.

creation_status.description: Confirms the successful creation of the new contact or provides details if there were any issues during the process.

content.name: delete_contact
content.description: This tool permanently removes a contact from the user's contact list by name. It is important to note that once a contact is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact to be deleted from the user's contact list.

deletion_status.description: A message confirming whether the contact has been successfully deleted or an error message if the deletion could not be processed.

content.name: delete_contact_email
content.description: This tool deletes an email address associated with a specified contact in the user's contact list. This action is irreversible, and the email address cannot be retrieved once deleted.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact whose email address is to be deleted.

contact_email.description: The specific email address to be deleted, if known. If not provided, the default operation will assume the only or primary email is to be deleted.

email_order.description: Specifies the order of the email address to be deleted if the contact has multiple email addresses. For example, '1' for the primary email, '2' for the secondary, and so on.

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the email address or informs about any issues that prevented the deletion.

content.name: delete_contact_number
content.description: This tool is designed to remove a phone number from a specified contact's detail within the user's contact list. It allows for precise deletion based on the phone number itself or its order among multiple numbers.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact from whom the phone number is to be deleted. The full name is required.

contact_number.description: The specific phone number to be deleted. If provided, this number is directly targeted for deletion.

number_order.description: If the contact has multiple numbers and no specific number is provided, this parameter specifies the order of the number to delete (e.g., the first number, second number, etc.).

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the phone number or provides details if the operation couldn't be completed.

content.name: search_contact
content.description: This tool searches the user's contact list for a specific contact based on provided search criteria such as the contact's name, phone number, or email address.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

content.name: update_contact_information
content.description: This tool allows for the modification of existing contact information or add more contact details within a user's contact list, such as updating a contact name, phone number, or email address.

phone_number.description: The original phone number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

email.description: The original email number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

name.description: The original name of the contact as currently stored in the contact list.

new_information.description: An object containing the new contact details that need to be updated.

new_name.description: The new name to assign to the contact, if changing the contact's name.

new_phone_number.description: The new phone number to be added to the contact list.

new_email.description: The new email to be added to the contact list.

update_status.description: Confirms the successful update of the contact's information or informs about any issues that prevented the update.

content.name: get_alarm
content.description: This tool is used to retrieve details about the user's existing alarms, including time, label, recurrence, and other settings.

time.description: The specific time of the alarm to retrieve information about.

label.description: The custom label or description associated with the alarm to identify it.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

alarm_details.description: The details of the retrieved alarms, which could include time, label, recurrence, sound, vibration settings, etc.

time.description: The specific time of the alarm to retrieve information about.

label.description: The custom label or description associated with the alarm to identify it.

sound.description: The chosen sound for the alarm when it goes off.

vibrate.description: Specifies the intensity of the vibration for the alarm. A value of 0 means no vibration. If the intensity of the vibration is not specified, the default intensity is 5.

type.description: The type of appointment, such as 'dentist', 'doctor', 'work meeting', etc., to filter the appointments list.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment.

appointment_address.description: The location or address of the appointment.

content.name: set_alarm
content.description: This tool is used for setting a new alarm based on the user's specified time, label, recurrence pattern, sound preference, and specific day(s) for the alarm to activate.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

sound.description: The chosen sound for the alarm when it goes off.

vibrate.description: Specifies the intensity of the vibration for the alarm. A value of 0 means no vibration. If the intensity of the vibration is not specified, the default intensity is 5.

time.description: The specified time for the alarm to go off.

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

content.name: add_new_contact
content.description: This tool allows for the creation of a brand-new contact entry in the user's contact list, using the provided personal information such as name, phone number, email address, and potentially a physical address.

email.description: The email address of the new contact, if available.

address.description: The physical address of the new contact.

contact_name.description: The full name of the new contact to be added to the contact list.

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the new contact.

creation_status.description: Confirms the successful creation of the new contact or provides details if there were any issues during the process.

content.name: delete_contact
content.description: This tool permanently removes a contact from the user's contact list by name. It is important to note that once a contact is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact to be deleted from the user's contact list.

deletion_status.description: A message confirming whether the contact has been successfully deleted or an error message if the deletion could not be processed.

content.name: delete_contact_email
content.description: This tool deletes an email address associated with a specified contact in the user's contact list. This action is irreversible, and the email address cannot be retrieved once deleted.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact whose email address is to be deleted.

contact_email.description: The specific email address to be deleted, if known. If not provided, the default operation will assume the only or primary email is to be deleted.

email_order.description: Specifies the order of the email address to be deleted if the contact has multiple email addresses. For example, '1' for the primary email, '2' for the secondary, and so on.

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the email address or informs about any issues that prevented the deletion.

content.name: delete_contact_number
content.description: This tool is designed to remove a phone number from a specified contact's detail within the user's contact list. It allows for precise deletion based on the phone number itself or its order among multiple numbers.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact from whom the phone number is to be deleted. The full name is required.

contact_number.description: The specific phone number to be deleted. If provided, this number is directly targeted for deletion.

number_order.description: If the contact has multiple numbers and no specific number is provided, this parameter specifies the order of the number to delete (e.g., the first number, second number, etc.).

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the phone number or provides details if the operation couldn't be completed.

content.name: search_contact
content.description: This tool searches the user's contact list for a specific contact based on provided search criteria such as the contact's name, phone number, or email address.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

content.name: update_contact_information
content.description: This tool allows for the modification of existing contact information or add more contact details within a user's contact list, such as updating a contact name, phone number, or email address.

phone_number.description: The original phone number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

email.description: The original email number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

name.description: The original name of the contact as currently stored in the contact list.

new_information.description: An object containing the new contact details that need to be updated.

new_name.description: The new name to assign to the contact, if changing the contact's name.

new_phone_number.description: The new phone number to be added to the contact list.

new_email.description: The new email to be added to the contact list.

update_status.description: Confirms the successful update of the contact's information or informs about any issues that prevented the update.

content.name: transfer_funds

source_account.description: Indicates the account type or identifier from which the money will be debited (e.g., 'checking').

destination_account.description: Indicates the account type or identifier to which the money will be credited (e.g., 'savings').

amount.description: The amount of money to be transferred between accounts.

transfer_speed.description: Specifies the speed at which the transfer is to be made. The transfer can be 'now' for immediate processing, or 'scheduled' for a deferred transfer.

transfer_status.description: Provides information on the status of the fund transfer, indicating success, in-progress, or failure.

new_email.description: The new email to be added to the contact list.

update_status.description: Confirms the successful update of the contact's information or informs about any issues that prevented the update.

content.name: transfer_funds
content.description: This tool is used to perform a monetary transfer between a user's bank accounts, such as from a checking account to a savings account.

schedule_time.description: If the transfer is scheduled, this parameter specifies the date and time for the transfer to happen. Should follow the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format.

account_number.description: The unique identifier for the user's bank account from which funds will be transferred.

source_account.description: Indicates the account type or identifier from which the money will be debited (e.g., 'checking').

destination_account.description: Indicates the account type or identifier to which the money will be credited (e.g., 'savings').

amount.description: The amount of money to be transferred between accounts.

transfer_speed.description: Specifies the speed at which the transfer is to be made. The transfer can be 'now' for immediate processing, or 'scheduled' for a deferred transfer.

transfer_status.description: Provides information on the status of the fund transfer, indicating success, in-progress, or failure.

content.name: cancel_alarm
content.description: This tool is used to cancel one or more alarms based on the specified time and recurrence pattern.

recurrence.description: Specifies on which days the alarm should be canceled. Each element in the list can be a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. If not provided, all alarms at the specified time will be canceled.

time.description: The specified time of the alarms to be canceled, in 24-hour format (HH:MM).

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

content.name: cancel_all_alarms
content.description: This tool is used to cancel all of the user's set alarms without requiring specific details for each individual alarm.

content.name: change_alarm_name
content.description: This tool is used to change the name of an existing alarm to a new specified name.

time.description: The specific time of the alarm to retrieve information about.

current_name.description: The current name or label of the alarm that the user wants to change.

new_name.description: The new name or label that the user wants to assign to the alarm.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: change_alarm_sound
content.description: This tool is used to change the sound of an existing alarm to a new specified sound.

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

time.description: The specified time for the alarm to go off.

sound.description: The new sound the user wants to use.

vibrate.description: Specifies the intensity of the vibration for the alarm. A value of 0 means no vibration. If the intensity of the vibration is not specified, the default intensity is 5.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: change_alarm_time
content.description: This tool is used to change the time of an existing alarm to a new specified time.

label.description: A custom name or description for the alarm.

current_time.description: The current time to which the user wants to change.

new_time.description: The new time to which the user wants to set the alarm.

current_recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

new_recurrence.description: Specifies how often the copied alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: copy_alarm
content.description: This tool is used to create a copy of an existing alarm with a new specified recurrence pattern and label, while preserving the original source time and recurrence.

label.description: A label for the copied alarm.

target_time.description: The time of the copied alarm, in the 24-hour format (HH:MM).

source_time.description: The time of the existing alarm to copy, in the 24-hour format (HH:MM).

source_recurrence.description: The recurrence pattern of the existing alarm to copy. Each element can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

target_recurrence.description: The new recurrence pattern assigned to the copied alarm. Each element can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

time.description: The specific time of the alarm to retrieve information about.

label.description: The custom label or description associated with the alarm to identify it.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

alarm_details.description: The details of the retrieved alarms, which could include time, label, recurrence, sound, vibration settings, etc.

label.description: The custom label or description associated with the alarm to identify it.

sound.description: The chosen sound for the alarm when it goes off.

vibrate.description: Specifies the intensity of the vibration for the alarm. A value of 0 means no vibration. If the intensity of the vibration is not specified, the default intensity is 5.

content.name: set_alarm
content.description: This tool is used for setting a new alarm based on the user's specified time, label, recurrence pattern, sound preference, and specific day(s) for the alarm to activate.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

sound.description: The chosen sound for the alarm when it goes off.

rating_value.description: The rating value provided by a user for a particular book or literary work.

user_review.description: The user's review of the book or literary work, including the rating, review text, reviewer name, and review date.

content.name: SearchCreativeWork
content.description: This tool allows the user to search for creative works such as movies, TV shows, music albums, books, or video games. It takes the name of the creative work as a required parameter and optionally, the type of the creative work. It returns information about the searched creative work, including details such as availability, platforms, genre, and purchase options.

object_type.description: The type of the creative work to be searched. It could be a movie, TV show, music album, book, or video game.

object_name.description: The name of the creative work to be searched.

creative_work_info.description: Information about the searched creative work, including details such as availability, platforms, genre, and purchase options.

content.name: SearchFlights
content.description: API for searching flight information.

flight_details.description: Flight details including flight number, departure, destination, date, departure time, arrival time, cabin class, and price.

content.name: SearchScreeningEvent
content.description: This tool allows the user to search for screening events such as movies, plays, or performances.

object_location_type.description: Defines the type of the location where the screening event is held.

movie_name.description: The name of the movie or performance.

location_name.description: The name of the place where the event is screened.

object_type.description: Specifies the category of the screening event (movie, play, performance).

timeRange.description: The range of time during which the event is screened.

spatial_relation.description: The relational context of the location where the event is screened.

movie_type.description: The type/genre of the movie or performance.

screening_events.description: A list of screening events available based on the user's search criteria.

items.description: The title and screening times of each event.

content.name: cancel_alarm
content.description: This tool is used to cancel one or more alarms based on the specified time and recurrence pattern.

recurrence.description: Specifies on which days the alarm should be canceled. Each element in the list can be a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. If not provided, all alarms at the specified time will be canceled.

time.description: The specified time of the alarms to be canceled, in 24-hour format (HH:MM).

new_name.description: The new name or label that the user wants to assign to the alarm.

recurrence.description: Specifies how often the alarm should repeat. Each element in the list can be a keyword ('everyday', 'weekdays', 'weekends'), a name of the day ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'), or a specific date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

content.name: book_auto_repair
content.description: This API should be called when a user has identified a car issue that needs professional service and is ready to book an auto repair service. It allows the user to select the type of repair needed, provide vehicle information, and choose an appointment time at a repair shop.

properties.name: name_store
properties.description: The name of the auto repair store.

properties.name: name_customer
properties.description: The name of the customer requesting the auto repair service.

properties.name: date_appt
properties.description: The specific date the customer wishes to book for the auto repair appointment.

properties.name: time_appt
properties.description: The specific time of day for the scheduled auto repair appointment.

properties.name: reason_appt
properties.description: The reason for the auto repair appointment, which may include details about the type of service or repair needed.

properties.name: name_vehicle
properties.description: The make or model name of the vehicle that requires repair.

properties.name: year_vehicle
properties.description: The manufacturing year of the vehicle to provide context about its potential needs for the repair.

properties.name: location_store
properties.description: The geographical location or address of the auto repair store.

content.name: check_repair_availability
content.description: This API should be called when a user is looking to find available time slots for vehicle repair. It helps users to determine when a repair shop can schedule their vehicle for service based on the shop's current bookings and opening hours.

properties.description: The specific date the customer wishes to book for the auto repair appointment.

properties.description: The specific time of day for the scheduled auto repair appointment.

properties.description: The reason for the auto repair appointment, which may include details about the type of service or repair needed.

properties.name: name_vehicle
properties.description: The make or model name of the vehicle that requires repair.

properties.name: year_vehicle
properties.description: The manufacturing year of the vehicle to provide context about its potential needs for the repair.

properties.name: location_store
properties.description: The geographical location or address of the auto repair store.

arriveBy.description: Desired time of arrival (requires either leaveAt or arriveBy)

departure.description: Starting location of the train journey

destination.description: Final destination of the train journey

return_info.description: List of details to be returned in response, with options such as 'all', 'trainID', 'Ticket' (price), 'ArriveBy', 'leaveAt'. If the user does not specify what information is needed, select 'all'; otherwise, fill in the corresponding name.

properties.description: The name of the pizza store where the order is being placed.

properties.name: name_pizza
properties.description: The specific name or title of the pizza chosen by the user.

properties.name: size_pizza
properties.description: The size of the pizza being ordered. Sizes typically range from small to large.

properties.name: type_topping
properties.description: The type of toppings requested on the pizza. Users can choose from a variety of toppings to customize their pizza according to their liking.

properties.name: type_crust
properties.description: The crust type desired for the pizza. Different options such as thin crust, thick crust, stuffed crust, or gluten-free crust may be available, depending on the pizza store.

properties.name: preference
properties.description: Any specific preferences or requests regarding the pizza order. This could include special instructions for preparation, such as 'extra cheese' or 'no onions'.

properties.name: location_store
properties.description: The geographical location of the pizza store.

content.name: add_new_contact
content.description: This tool allows for the creation of a brand-new contact entry in the user's contact list, using the provided personal information such as name, phone number, email address, and potentially a physical address.

email.description: The email address of the new contact, if available.

address.description: The physical address of the new contact.

contact_name.description: The full name of the new contact to be added to the contact list.

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the new contact.

creation_status.description: Confirms the successful creation of the new contact or provides details if there were any issues during the process.

content.name: change_appointment
content.description: This tool is used to modify the details of an existing appointment. It requires the appointment ID along with the new information to be updated.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

new_appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

new_appointment_date.description: The new date for the appointment, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

new_appointment_time.description: The new time for the appointment, provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

new_appointment_location.description: Optional. The new location or address for the appointment if it has changed.

new_appointment_information.description: Optional. A new description for the appointment if additional details need to be specified.

update_status.description: Indicates whether the appointment was successfully updated or not.

content.name: delete_appointment
content.description: This tool is used to delete a specific appointment from a user's schedule based on provided identifiers such as appointment ID or date and time.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

deletion_status.description: Status of the deletion operation, indicating success or failure.

content.name: delete_contact
content.description: This tool permanently removes a contact from the user's contact list by name. It is important to note that once a contact is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact to be deleted from the user's contact list.

deletion_status.description: A message confirming whether the contact has been successfully deleted or an error message if the deletion could not be processed.

content.name: delete_contact_email
content.description: This tool deletes an email address associated with a specified contact in the user's contact list. This action is irreversible, and the email address cannot be retrieved once deleted.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact whose email address is to be deleted.

contact_email.description: The specific email address to be deleted, if known. If not provided, the default operation will assume the only or primary email is to be deleted.

email_order.description: Specifies the order of the email address to be deleted if the contact has multiple email addresses. For example, '1' for the primary email, '2' for the secondary, and so on.

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the email address or informs about any issues that prevented the deletion.

content.name: delete_contact_number
content.description: This tool is designed to remove a phone number from a specified contact's detail within the user's contact list. It allows for precise deletion based on the phone number itself or its order among multiple numbers.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact from whom the phone number is to be deleted. The full name is required.

contact_number.description: The specific phone number to be deleted. If provided, this number is directly targeted for deletion.

number_order.description: If the contact has multiple numbers and no specific number is provided, this parameter specifies the order of the number to delete (e.g., the first number, second number, etc.).

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the phone number or provides details if the operation couldn't be completed.

content.name: get_user_appointments
content.description: This tool is designed to retrieve a list of scheduled appointments for the user. It can filter appointments by various criteria such as date, name, and type of appointment.

date.description: The specific date for which the user wants to retrieve appointments. It should follow the YYYY-MM-DD format.

name.description: The name or description of the appointment to help narrow down the search.

type.description: The type of appointment, such as 'dentist', 'doctor', 'work meeting', etc., to filter the appointments list.

time_range.description: A time range within the specified date to retrieve appointments for, such as 'morning' or 'afternoon'.

appointment_name.description: The name of the appointment.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment.

appointment_address.description: The location or address of the appointment.

content.name: search_contact
content.description: This tool searches the user's contact list for a specific contact based on provided search criteria such as the contact's name, phone number, or email address.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

content.name: set_appointment_reminder
content.description: This tool is used to create a reminder for a user-specified appointment. It requires details such as the appointment name, date, time, and optionally, the address and reminder time.

appointment_information.description: Provides detailed summary or specific information about the appointment. This could include purpose, participants, location, or any other important details relevant to the appointment.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

appointment_address.description: The address of the appointment location, if applicable.

reminder_time.description: The time at which the reminder should trigger. Should be provided in a relative format such as '2 hours before' or an exact time format such as HH:MM.

content.name: update_contact_information
content.description: This tool allows for the modification of existing contact information or add more contact details within a user's contact list, such as updating a contact name, phone number, or email address.

phone_number.description: The original phone number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

email.description: The original email number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

name.description: The original name of the contact as currently stored in the contact list.

new_information.description: An object containing the new contact details that need to be updated.

new_name.description: The new name to assign to the contact, if changing the contact's name.

new_phone_number.description: The new phone number to be added to the contact list.

new_email.description: The new email to be added to the contact list.

update_status.description: Confirms the successful update of the contact's information or informs about any issues that prevented the update.

apartment_type.description: The type of apartment the user is interested in (e.g., 'penthouse', 'studio').

max_price.description: The maximum monthly rent the user is willing to pay for the apartment, specified in the local currency.

min_price.description: The minimum monthly rent the user is willing to pay for the apartment, specified in the local currency.

pet.description: Indicates whether the apartment must allow pets. Accepts two values: true (pet-friendly) or false (not pet-friendly).

city.description: The city where the user is looking to find an apartment.

location.description: The area or city where the user is looking to find an apartment.

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the apartment. Can be specified as a numerical value (e.g., '2' for two bedrooms).

apartment_id.description: A unique identifier for the specific apartment listing for which detailed information is being requested.

content.name: get_apartment_specific_info
content.description: This tool is used to retrieve detailed information about a specific apartment based on criteria such as location, number of rooms, price, size, and contact information for inquiries.

city.description: The city where the user is looking for an apartment if required to retrieve the specific apartment listing.

location.description: The specific area or neighborhood of the city for the apartment, if needed for the detailed information request.

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the apartment, if this information is necessary to acquire the proper details.

apartment_id.description: A unique identifier for the specific apartment listing for which detailed information is being requested.

price.description: The monthly rent price of the apartment.

size.description: The size of the apartment in square feet.

contact_number.description: The phone number for contacting the leasing company or landlord for the apartment.

pet.description: Indicates whether the apartment must allow pets. Accepts two values: true (pet-friendly) or false (not pet-friendly).

apartment_type.description: The type of apartment the user is interested in (e.g., 'penthouse', 'studio').

content.name: send_apartments_message
content.description: This tool is responsible for sending detailed information regarding user-selected apartments to the user's email address.

email.description: The email address the user wants to send.

apartment_id.description: A unique identifier for the specific apartment listing for which detailed information is being requested.

content.name: add_new_contact
content.description: This tool allows for the creation of a brand-new contact entry in the user's contact list, using the provided personal information such as name, phone number, email address, and potentially a physical address.

email.description: The email address of the new contact, if available.

address.description: The physical address of the new contact.

contact_name.description: The full name of the new contact to be added to the contact list.

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the new contact.

creation_status.description: Confirms the successful creation of the new contact or provides details if there were any issues during the process.

content.name: delete_contact
content.description: This tool permanently removes a contact from the user's contact list by name. It is important to note that once a contact is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact to be deleted from the user's contact list.

deletion_status.description: A message confirming whether the contact has been successfully deleted or an error message if the deletion could not be processed.

content.name: delete_contact_email
content.description: This tool deletes an email address associated with a specified contact in the user's contact list. This action is irreversible, and the email address cannot be retrieved once deleted.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact whose email address is to be deleted.

contact_email.description: The specific email address to be deleted, if known. If not provided, the default operation will assume the only or primary email is to be deleted.

email_order.description: Specifies the order of the email address to be deleted if the contact has multiple email addresses. For example, '1' for the primary email, '2' for the secondary, and so on.

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the email address or informs about any issues that prevented the deletion.

content.name: delete_contact_number
content.description: This tool is designed to remove a phone number from a specified contact's detail within the user's contact list. It allows for precise deletion based on the phone number itself or its order among multiple numbers.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact from whom the phone number is to be deleted. The full name is required.

contact_number.description: The specific phone number to be deleted. If provided, this number is directly targeted for deletion.

number_order.description: If the contact has multiple numbers and no specific number is provided, this parameter specifies the order of the number to delete (e.g., the first number, second number, etc.).

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the phone number or provides details if the operation couldn't be completed.

object_name.description: The name of the creative work to be searched.

creative_work_info.description: Information about the searched creative work, including details such as availability, platforms, genre, and purchase options.

content.name: change_appointment
content.description: This tool is used to modify the details of an existing appointment. It requires the appointment ID along with the new information to be updated.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

new_appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

new_appointment_date.description: The new date for the appointment, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

new_appointment_time.description: The new time for the appointment, provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

new_appointment_location.description: Optional. The new location or address for the appointment if it has changed.

new_appointment_information.description: Optional. A new description for the appointment if additional details need to be specified.

update_status.description: Indicates whether the appointment was successfully updated or not.

content.name: delete_appointment

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

content.name: get_user_appointments

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment.

appointment_address.description: The location or address of the appointment.

appointment_name.description: A descriptive name of the appointment for which a reminder is being set.

appointment_date.description: The date of the appointment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

appointment_time.description: The time of the appointment for which a reminder is being set. Should be provided in a standard time format such as HH:MM.

appointment_address.description: The address of the appointment location, if applicable.

content.name: add_new_contact
content.description: This tool allows for the creation of a brand-new contact entry in the user's contact list, using the provided personal information such as name, phone number, email address, and potentially a physical address.

email.description: The email address of the new contact, if available.

address.description: The physical address of the new contact.

contact_name.description: The full name of the new contact to be added to the contact list.

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the new contact.

creation_status.description: Confirms the successful creation of the new contact or provides details if there were any issues during the process.

content.name: delete_contact
content.description: This tool permanently removes a contact from the user's contact list by name. It is important to note that once a contact is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact to be deleted from the user's contact list.

deletion_status.description: A message confirming whether the contact has been successfully deleted or an error message if the deletion could not be processed.

content.name: delete_contact_email
content.description: This tool deletes an email address associated with a specified contact in the user's contact list. This action is irreversible, and the email address cannot be retrieved once deleted.

contact_name.description: The full name of the contact whose email address is to be deleted.

contact_email.description: The specific email address to be deleted, if known. If not provided, the default operation will assume the only or primary email is to be deleted.

email_order.description: Specifies the order of the email address to be deleted if the contact has multiple email addresses. For example, '1' for the primary email, '2' for the secondary, and so on.

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the email address or informs about any issues that prevented the deletion.

content.name: delete_contact_number
content.description: This tool is designed to remove a phone number from a specified contact's detail within the user's contact list. It allows for precise deletion based on the phone number itself or its order among multiple numbers.

contact_name.description: The name of the contact from whom the phone number is to be deleted. The full name is required.

contact_number.description: The specific phone number to be deleted. If provided, this number is directly targeted for deletion.

number_order.description: If the contact has multiple numbers and no specific number is provided, this parameter specifies the order of the number to delete (e.g., the first number, second number, etc.).

deletion_status.description: Confirms the successful removal of the phone number or provides details if the operation couldn't be completed.

content.name: search_contact
content.description: This tool searches the user's contact list for a specific contact based on provided search criteria such as the contact's name, phone number, or email address.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

contact_name.description: The full name or partial name of the contact to search for.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact to search for.

email.description: The email address of the contact to search for.

content.name: update_contact_information
content.description: This tool allows for the modification of existing contact information or add more contact details within a user's contact list, such as updating a contact name, phone number, or email address.

phone_number.description: The original phone number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

email.description: The original email number of the contact that needs to be replaced.

name.description: The original name of the contact as currently stored in the contact list.

new_information.description: An object containing the new contact details that need to be updated.

new_name.description: The new name to assign to the contact, if changing the contact's name.

new_phone_number.description: The new phone number to be added to the contact list.

new_email.description: The new email to be added to the contact list.

update_status.description: Confirms the successful update of the contact's information or informs about any issues that prevented the update.

properties.description: The specific name of the coffee drink that the user wishes to order. This might include options like espresso, latte, cappuccino, etc.
